downloadTitle: Test Lab Guide: Windows Server 2012 R2 Hyper-V Network Virtualization with System Center 2012 R2 VMM
downloadDescription: Provides instructions to create the Windows Server 2012 R2 Network Virtualization with System Center 2012 R2 Virtual Machine Manager (VMM) test lab, using computers running Windows Server 2012 R2.

downloadFile.name: Windows Server 2012 R2 Hyper-V Network Virtualization with System Center 2012 R2 VMM Test Lab_RTM.docx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/7/d/5/7d512a75-1432-4cb1-9d9e-a4a2d78b865b/Windows Server 2012 R2 Hyper-V Network Virtualization with System Center 2012 R2 VMM Test Lab_RTM.docx

detailsSection: This Microsoft Test Lab Guide (TLG) provides you with step-by-step instructions to create the Windows Server 2012 R2 Network Virtualization with System Center 2012 R2 Virtual Machine Manager (VMM) test lab, using computers running Windows Server 2012 R2. This test lab is based on four physical computers, each hosting multiple virtual machines. Updated September 2013 to include forwarding gateway and NAT functionality.
detailsSection_file_name: Windows Server 2012 R2 Hyper-V Network Virtualization with System Center 2012 R2 VMM Test Lab_RTM.docx
installInstructionSection:
• To start the download, click the Download button, and then do one of the following:
    • To start the download immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for viewing at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the download, click Cancel.

relatedResourcesSection.title: main Test Lab Guides portal page
